hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Base_Build_Version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The full build version to run the restore for

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Depend_Patches_Verions
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma seperated list of dependent patches to restore

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: emailGroups
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
This value is supplied by builds initiated through RTC.
Groups receipts are loaded from \\isr1appcc02\SCM\OMD\Jenkins_Build_conf_files\Email_DLs.txt.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: buildResultUUID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The UUID of the build result in RTC. It is supplied by builds initiated through RTC. For builds initiated through Hudson/Jenkins, no value should be supplied.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ProjectsToBuild
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma seperated projects full path list for all the projects participating this build. Example: Archer\Common\Archer_ProductVersion\Archer_ProductVersion.vcxproj,OMD_Common\PlatformVersion\PlatformVersion.vcxproj

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PATCH_SUPPORT_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Minimum version required to install the patch on top

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: README
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
Patch V${Patch_Version} - to be installed on top V${PATCH_SUPPORT_VERSION} ${PATCHES_DATA}

This patch is solving the following bugs:
${RTC_WIs_DATA}


Automatic Installation Instructions (Release configuration only):

1. Copy \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_${MajorMinor_Ver}\Formal\UOMD_${Patch_Version}_Patch to C:\Temp

2. Run C:\Temp\UOMD_${Patch_Version}_Patch\Release\install.bat



Manual Installation instructions:
1. Run KT-Stop

2. Copy build folders from:

Debug build: \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_${MajorMinor_Ver}\Formal\UOMD_${Patch_Version}_Patch\Debug Release build: \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_${MajorMinor_Ver}\Formal\UOMD_${Patch_Version}_Patch\Release to C:\5300\

3. Run KT-start.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
SET team_scm_fetchDestination=%team.scm.fetchDestination% echo ***************************************** ECHO Loading Build Outputs from share folder echo ***************************************** CALL D:\Sandboxes\DONOT_DELETE_ADHAM\OMD_Builds\JenkinsBuild\BatchFiles\CreateBuildOutputsFromShare.bat %Base_Build_Version% %Patch_Version% "Release,Debug" Formal %team.scm.workspaceUUID% IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( ECHO "CreateBuildOutputsFromShare failed. Please check logs." EXIT /b 1 ) ECHO "Updating sources with patch version %Patch_Version% " SET BUILD_VERSION=%Patch_Version% SET BUILDVERSION=%Patch_Version% CALL %team_scm_fetchDestination%\OMD_Builds\JenkinsBuild\BatchFiles\DoFullBuild.bat IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( ECHO "build failed. Please check logs." EXIT /b 1 )
echo **************************** echo Copying version files echo **************************** xcopy V:\OMD_Common\INC\ProductVersionInfo.cs P:\inc /f /r xcopy V:\OMD_Common\INC\KTProductVersion.h P:\inc /f /r xcopy V:\OMD_Common\INC\KTPlatformVersion.h P:\inc /f /r
for %%a in ("%ProjectsToCompile:,=" "%") do ( echo ****************************************************** echo ****************************************************** echo Compiling project: %%a in Mode:Release Platform:x64 c:\PROGRA~2\MSBuild\14.0\Bin\amd64\msbuild.exe %team_scm_fetchDestination%\\%%a /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64 IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( ECHO "Compilation of project %%a failed. Please check logs." EXIT /b 1 ) echo ****************************************************** echo Compiling project: %%a in Mode:Debug Platform:x64 c:\PROGRA~2\MSBuild\14.0\Bin\amd64\msbuild.exe %team_scm_fetchDestination%\\%%a /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64 IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( ECHO "Compilation of project %%a failed. Please check logs." EXIT /b 1 ) echo ****************************************************** echo ****************************************************** ) echo *********************** echo Run MCDB Checksum echo *********************** CALL %team_scm_fetchDestination%\OMD_Builds\JenkinsBuild\BatchFiles\MCDBXMLChecksum.bat IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( ECHO "MCDB checksum execution failed. Please check logs." EXIT /b 1 )
mkdir \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Debug\Lib_Debug mkdir \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Debug\Bin mkdir \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release\Lib_Release mkdir \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release\Bin
echo ************************* echo Creating README file echo ************************* echo %README% > \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\ReadMe.txt
echo ******************************************* echo Copy Install.bat to Release Patch dir echo ******************************************* xcopy V:\OMD_Builds\OMD_Builds\CM\BatchFiles\Template for patch installation\install.bat \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release /f /r
echo ******************************************* echo Edit Install.bat with corrent versions echo ******************************************* SETLOCAL=ENABLEDELAYEDEXPANSION set installScript=\\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release\install.bat
rename %installScript% %installScript%.tmp
for /f %%a in (%installScript%.tmp) do ( set foo=%%a if %foo%=="set MIN_VER=" set foo="set MIN_VER=%PATCH_SUPPORT_VERSION%" if %foo%=="set PATCH_VER=" set foo="set PATCH_VER=%Patch_Version%" echo !foo! >> %installScript%) ::del %installScript%.tmp echo ******************************************* echo Copy Install.bat to Debug Patch dir echo ******************************************* xcopy %installScript% \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Debug /f /r
echo ******************************************* echo Copy new binaries to Debug Patch dir echo ******************************************* xcopy P:\Bin_Debug \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Debug\Bin /f /r /d:%date:~-10%
echo ******************************************* echo Copy new binaries to Release Patch dir echo ******************************************* xcopy P:\Bin_Release \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release\Bin /f /r /d:%date:~-10%
echo ******************************************* echo Copy new libraries to Debug Patch dir echo ******************************************* xcopy P:\Lib_Debug \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release\Lib_Debug /f /r /d:%date:~-10%
echo ******************************************* echo Copy new libraries to Release Patch dir echo ******************************************* xcopy P:\Lib_Release \\klasj\ktfiles\Regions\Israel\SWGRP\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\Formal\UOMD_%Patch_Version%_Patch\Release\Lib_Release /f /r

info.groovyScriptContent:
def PATCHES_DATA if (Depend_Patches_Verions !="") PATCHES_DATA ="with the following patches: "+Depend_Patches_Verions else PATCHES_DATA= Depend_Patches_Verions
def map = ["PATCHES_DATA": PATCHES_DATA] return map
